text.0: agni best winner of the spoil cause us to praise before the gods.
text.1: as our associate meet for lauds wealth which thou verily deemest wealth.
text.2: agni the great who ward not off the anger of thy power and might.
text.3: stir up the wrath and hatred due to one who holds an alien creed.
text.4: thee agni would we choose as priest the perfecter of strength and skill.
text.5: we who bring sacred food invoke with song thee chief at holy rites.
text.6: here as is needful for thine aid we toil o conqueror day by day.
text.7: for wealth for law may we rejoice most wise one at the feast with kine rejoice with heroes at the feast.
